flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Additional Materials Required:

  • Thread tape
  • Shaker motor Buy
  • 1/2" NPT Needle Valve (1) Buy
  • 1/4"x12" NPTM Hydraulic hose (1)Buy
  • 1/2"x36" NPTM Hydraulic hoses (2)
  • SAE 4M to 1/4" NPTF Swivel (1)Buy
  • 1/2" NPT Hex Nipple (2) Buy
  • 1/2" NPTF Tee (1) Buy
  • 1/2" NPTM to 1/4" NPTF bushing Buy
guide.introduction_rendered:
Additional Materials Required:

  • Thread tape
  • Shaker motor Buy
  • 1/2" NPT Needle Valve (1) Buy
  • 1/4"x12" NPTM Hydraulic hose (1)Buy
  • 1/2"x36" NPTM Hydraulic hoses (2)
  • SAE 4M to 1/4" NPTF Swivel (1)Buy
  • 1/2" NPT Hex Nipple (2) Buy
  • 1/2" NPTF Tee (1) Buy
  • 1/2" NPTM to 1/4" NPTF bushing Buy
Tools
  • Vise
  • various wrenches

steps.title: Things to know about working with hydraulics:

lines.text: Thread tape is necessary between each connection unless otherwise stated.
lines.text_raw: Thread tape is necessary between each connection unless otherwise stated.

lines.text: Always wrap thread tape clockwise when facing the threaded portion.
lines.text_raw: Always wrap thread tape clockwise when facing the threaded portion.

lines.text: Always keep the end caps on hoses and fittings until you need to take them off. They need to stay protected inside.
lines.text_raw: Always keep the end caps on hoses and fittings until you need to take them off. They need to stay protected inside.

lines.text: Attach all of the fittings and the 2 hoses  to the Tee, except the small swivel.
lines.text_raw: Attach all of the fittings and the 2 hoses  to the Tee, except the small swivel.

lines.text: Tighten the tee assembly into the correct port (see the photo)
lines.text_raw: Tighten the tee assembly into the correct port (see the photo)

lines.text: Install the swivel and tighten the small hose to it.
lines.text_raw: Install the swivel and tighten the small hose to it.

lines.text: The swivel doesn't need thread tape.
lines.text_raw: The swivel doesn't need thread tape.

lines.text: Put the other 36" hose into the remaining port on the motor.
lines.text_raw: Put the other 36" hose into the remaining port on the motor.

guide.title: CEB Shaker Hydraulics Assembly
